Text:
Yes, thanks. A classic.

For those not already familiar:

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0024844/
thanks....but why the movie is 4 minute shorter than the imdb running time?

This is an excellent copy - picture quality is very good. Soundtrack is French but there are English subtitles. 

It's a film classic and for me has the added bonus that I'm trying to learn the French language.
